name: ifreakinglovesmartgadgets
0:
”Alexa, open smart gadgets blog”
”Alexa, ask smart gadgets blog for the latest update”
”Alexa, start smart gadgets blog”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart gadgets blog
des: Using this skill, you can stay up to date with IFL Smart Gadgets (your favourite tech blog), in audio form! You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. You can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". As a reminder, no command you use with Alexa while listening to this blog will be shared with the developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
